content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://globalelectronicsadls.dfs.core.windows.net/global-electronic-files/GlobalElectronicTrainingData/partionedData/PRODUCTKEY=1/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
